name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Charles DIGGS, Appellant

judges: Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT and HUTCHINSON, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Charles DIGGS, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Appeal dismissed, 273 Pa.Super. 121, 416 A.2d 1119, as having been improvidently granted.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Ralph B. Pinskey, Harrisburg, for appellant.
William A. Behe, Deputy Dist. Atty., for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
446 A.2d 600
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Charles DIGGS, Appellant.
No. 80-2-301.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued May 19, 1982.
Decided June 17, 1982.
Ralph B. Pinskey, Harrisburg, for appellant.
William A. Behe, Deputy Dist. Atty., for appellee.
Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT and HUTCHINSON, JJ.
